creator: IvyPods
descriptionHtml:
Yellow class is an online platform for kids to learn, explore and discover through various live hobby classes such as dance, storytelling, story writing, vocabulary, painting, drawing, art and craft, flameless cooking, and many more. Get these classes free from top mentors.

Why join Yellow Class?

- Free live hobby classes: Attend daily free live classes from this app. Material required, timings, etc will be updated in the calender atleast 48 hours before to the Class.

Various Programs to explore: With over 30+ unique hobby class which includes dance, calligraphy, yoga, phonics, flameless cooking, and many more. Kids can choose their favourites by taking all these class for free.

Highly Certified and experienced mentors: Teachers at Yellow class are very engaging and interactive making the environment joyous and learning. They keep up with our notion of 'fun and learn'.

Classes with Polls/Quiz: In-between the classes answer some topic related questions to test your learnings.

Doubts get answered right away : During the live session our coaches will clear all your doubts immediately.
descriptionShort: Free live activity classes & premium content for kids

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update will streamline the onboarding flow and has some bug fixes and improvements.

title: Yellow Class - Kids Live Hobby Classes

creator: IvyPods
descriptionHtml:
Yellow Class is an online platform for kids to learn, explore and discover through various live hobby classes and courses for kids. They can learn and play through various learning activities such as dance, storytelling, story writing, creative writing, vocabulary, painting, language learning, drawing for kids, quizzes, art and craft, flameless cooking, kids workshops, and many more.

Get these classes free from top mentors and teachers. The endless learning academy - Exceptional educational app for kids - Free!

Search and explore various learning programs for kids. Art classes, kids workshop, quizzes, or fun math? You can find that and many more live hobby classes in our app. Let your kids learn and play and improve kids' confidence with learning new skills.

⏩Some benefits and features of our educational app for kids live hobby classes:⏪
✔️ Inspiring Mentors - Our creative and certified teachers will know how to engage with your kids and lead them through various learning activities.
✔️ Kids Workshop - Get introduced to new courses for kids. Single sessions help them to get familiar with new hobbies and subjects.
✔️ Multiple Learners Available - If you have more than one child, you can add all of them and manage profiles to customize what they will learn.
✔️ Language Learning for Kids - They will have the opportunity to improve their vocabulary and speaking skills
✔️ Kids Creative Writing - Our mentors from this field will make them fall in love with writing! They will learn about creative writing in a fun and engaging way.
✔️ Interactive Kids Learning Activities - Get ready to have fun, perform experiments and create small crafts. These are small do it yourself kids learning activities that can be done in a few minutes!
✔️ Drawing for Kids - Find drawing classes for your little ones and let our teachers teach them how to draw in a fun way.
✔️ Progress Report - Check your child`s progress, see how well it`s doing. Check watched classes, workshops attended, and other activities.
✔️ Class Calendar - Check out the schedule of all classes, programs, workshops happening on Calendar.
✔️ Classroom Community Feed - Share your kids work in the community feed and get feedback from mentors!

❓WHY JOIN YELLOW CLASSES❓

⭐FREE LIVE HOBBY CLASSES⭐
Attend daily free live classes from this app. Material required, timings, etc., will be updated in the Calendar at least 48 hours before the Class.

⭐VARIOUS LEARNING PROGRAMS FOR KIDS TO EXPLORE⭐
With over 30+ unique hobby classes, including dance, calligraphy, drawing, yoga, phonics, flameless cooking, kids workshop and many more. Kids can choose their favourites by taking all these classes for free and learn in the live classroom!

⭐HIGHLY CERTIFIED AND EXPERIENCED MENTORS⭐
Teachers at Yellow Class are very engaging and interactive, making the environment joyous and learning. They keep up with our notion of 'fun and learn'.

⭐CLASSES WITH POLLS/QUIZZES⭐
In-between the classes, answer some topic-related questions to test your learnings - Kids quizzes and polls.

⭐DOUBTS GET ANSWERED RIGHT AWAY⭐
During the live session, our coaches will clear all your doubts immediately.

Ignite your child's passion and interest with interactive kids learning activities - Improve their confidence! Get access to 100s of FREE learning programs and courses for kids!

➡️➡️➡️ Download our online learning platform for kids and let your kids learn and play! Live kids hobby classes that will change the classic perception of learning and make it fun - Learn and play! The endless learning academy - Exceptional educational app for kids - Free!
descriptionShort: Free educational app for kids | Endless Learning Academy | Quiz | Live Classroom

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update contains many fixes and improvements essential to perfect your Yellow Class learning experience.

✅Hula Hoop Classes

✅Space & Environment
✅Countries and Their Capitals
✅Indian Festivals
✅National Symbols

✅Vedic Maths
✅Sudoku
✅Puzzles & BrainTeasers
✅Multiplication Games
✅Fun with Numbers

✅Learn the Moves

✅Lose Pieces Wisely

✅Learn Dance with Salman

✅Cook with MasterChef Ripu

⭐Fun Activities⭐

✅DIY Science Experiments
✅DIY Craft SnowMan
✅DIY Art Classes


⭐Key Highlights⭐
FUN learning & education app for kids with 1000+ FREE Hobby classes of Dance, Art & Craft, Music, English, Yoga, Vocabulary, Spoken English, Maths, Logical Reasoning, Flameless Cooking, Story Telling, Vedic Maths, Kids Workshops and a lot more. Kids can win Scholarships & huge prizes such as Iphone, MacBook, Trip to Disneyland in daily, weekly and monthly competitions and contests.

✔️ Free to Use - Get access to 1000s of FREE learning Hobby Programs and
Courses.
✔️ Inspiring Mentors - Our Celebrity Mentors along with our creative and
certified teachers know how to engage with your kids and lead them
through various learning activities. Our online learning platform is the
place where you can get the best knowledge for kids!

title: Yellow Class - Kids Learn Live

creator: IvyPods
descriptionHtml:
#1 Daily Practice App Created for School Toppers!

Trusted by more than 10 million parents to help kids learn and practice English, Math, and Art. We focus on forming good habits, better conceptual understanding, and building confidence.

Download the App if you want your child to become a top performer in school and stay ahead of the class.

What’s in it for kids👨‍🎓👨‍🎓?

📝LEARN WITH PRACTICE📝
✅15 MINS DAILY EXERCISES✅
⭐DAILY CONCEPT & SOLUTION VIDEOS⭐
⭐1-1 LIVE DOUBT-SOLVING CLASSES⭐
🥇 PARTICIPATE IN NATIONAL CONTESTS & OLYMPIADS🥇
🏆EARN CERTIFICATES, TROPHIES & SCHOLARSHIPS🏆

What’s in it for parents?

📈TRACK YOUR CHILD'S PROGRESS📈
🚪EDUCATION AT YOUR DOORSTEP🚪
⭐GET REGULAR REMINDERS FOR THEIR KID'S UPCOMING EXERCISES⭐
✅GET THEIR KIDS TO PARTICIPATE IN CONTESTS & OLYMPIADS AND WIN EXCITING PRIZES✅

Our Teaching Methodology

📝PRACTICE📝PRACTICE📝PRACTICE📝

⭐ Helps in habit forming
⭐ Encourages active learning
⭐ Leads to excellence & success

🔤MASTER ENGLISH🔤

Our curriculums are specially curated by IIT & IIM graduates to help kids become Confident Speaker, Creative Writer & Avid Reader

🔠 Vocabulary, Synonyms & Antonyms, Homophones
🔠 Vowels, Sounds & Phonic Sense
🔠 English Grammar - Parts of Speech, Determiners, Participles, Conjunctions, Modal Words
🔠 Mastering Tenses
🔠 Fluent Speaking, Debating Skills, Presentation Skills, Group Discussions
🔠 All parts of speech–Noun, Pronoun, Verb, Adjectives, Articles & Punctuations
🔠 Sentence Corrections, Jumbled Sentences, Idioms, Phrases & Clauses
🔠 Public Speaking & Personality Development
🔠 Notice Writing, Journaling, Letter Writing, Articles, Essays, Poems

📊 SOLVE MATH LIKE A PRO 📐

Make kids efficient decision-makers. This Program helps in eliminating the fear of Math and in achieving 10X faster calculations.

📈 Place Value
📈 Add & Subtract Mentally
📈 Multiply & Division Techniques
📈 Angles, Triangles, Areas, 3D Shapes, Coordinate Geometry
📈 Unit of Length, Mass, Conversion, Word Problems
📈 Comparison of Fractions, Decimals
📈 Time, Speed & Distance Word Problems
📈 Prime Numbers, LCM & HCF, Reading & Writing Exponents
📈 Statics, Probability, Range, Mean & Median
📈 BODMAS With Exponents & Parenthesis
📈 Algebraic Equation & Arithmetic Problems

🎭 CREATIVITY & FOCUS THROUGH ART 🎭

Make kids ready for future success. This program helps in enhancing self-expression, emotional balance & coordination. Hop in to become the innovative leaders of tomorrow.

🎨 Art Work with Lines, Colour using Paints, Plastic & Wax Crayons
🎨 Artwork in Different Shapes & Sizes
🎨 Draw Human Faces, Figures & Cartoons
🎨 Colour Gradation, Mixing & Blending Colour Techniques
🎨 Painting Techniques- Indian Folk Art, Mexican Art, Mosiac Art, Resist Art, Warli, Madhubani & Mandala Art
🎨 Shading, Colouring & Different Forms of Media

Fun Learning & Education app (Formerly Yellow Class) with an objective to help kids acquire a positive mindset, self-expression, cognitive ability, and creative thinking ability through English and Math curriculums. Kids can present their work in Ivykids (Formerly Yellow Class) magazines, publish their own books on Amazon, start their own Youtube channel, and can become kid influencers.

title: Ivy Kids Learn & Speak English

creator: Yellow Class
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to IvyKids! The ultimate online English speaking program for kids from KG to Class 6! Our program is specially designed for kids to master English speaking, vocabulary, grammar, reading, and public speaking skills in a fun and interactive way.

🌟 Key Features 🌟:

🎓 Expert-Designed: Created by language experts, Ivykids uses a science-based teaching method to improve long-term language retention.


👩‍🏫One-on-One Mentor: Personalized guidance from a mentor to track your child's progress in English learning classes.


🤖 AI-Powered Speaking Exercises: Kids can practice English speaking with our AI teacher and friend, covering various topics like hobbies, situations, general knowledge, and history, which helps improve their spoken English.


🙋❓Doubt Solving Sessions: Live teachers are available to help resolve any doubts your child may have, in properly scheduled classes, making it the best English learning app for kids.


🗣️ Group Live Public Speaking Sessions: Kids participate in live debates, Show and Tell, impromptu speaking, storytelling, and speeches, receiving feedback from the teacher and learning from their peers.


✅ MCQ Exercises & 100+ Concept Videos: Expert teachers provide concept video classes on English grammar, vocabulary, reading, and speaking skills followed by engaging exercises, such as MCQs, reading, and speaking practice.

🏆 Progress Tracking: Keep your child motivated with playful rewards and achievements as they work towards their English learning goals, making practising a daily habit with the best online classes!

🎯 Interactive Speaking Exercises: Our English Learning app provides real-time feedback on pronunciation and grammar which helps your child improve.

🌟Perfect for:
1. Parents looking for the best English learning app for their kids
2. Best online Spoken English classes for kids from ages 5 to 12
3. Kids who want to improve their English speaking, reading, vocabulary, and grammar skills
4. Students aiming to excel in public speaking and communication


What we offer❓

📝 15 MINS DAILY PRACTICE EXERCISES
⭐ DAILY CONCEPT & SOLUTION VIDEOS
🗣️ LIVE SPEAKING & QUIZ SESSIONS
⭐ 1-1 LIVE DOUBT-SOLVING CLASSES
🥇 PARTICIPATE IN OLYMPIADS & CONTESTS
🏆 EARN CERTIFICATES, TROPHIES & SCHOLARSHIPS
🤖 AI-POWERED SPEAKING EXERCISES

✨More than 1 CR+ parents trust that Ivykids is the Best English Learning App for their kids.✨

Which concepts will your child learn❓

🔠 Vocabulary, Synonyms & Antonyms, Homophones
🔠 Vowels, Sounds & Phonic Sense
🔠 English Grammar
🔠 Mastering Tenses
🔠 All parts of speech–Noun, Pronoun, Verb, Adjectives, Articles & Punctuations
🔠 Sentence Corrections, Jumbled Sentences, Idioms, Phrases & Clauses
🔠 Notice Writing, Journaling, Letter Writing, Articles, Essays, Poems

✅Our English Learning App ensures your child progresses at their own speed through a structured curriculum, with AI-powered speaking exercises, doubt-solving sessions, group live public speaking sessions, and interactive speaking exercises that provide real-time feedback on pronunciation and grammar.

Download the Best English Learning App - Ivykids! and watch your child's language skills shine!🚀🚀🚀

FAQs


Q. How can I enrol my kid in Ivykids?
A. You can download our app from the playstore and complete registration to enrol.

Q. Is IvyKids free?
A. No, Ivykids is a paid platform and it provides an affordable English learning program for kids.

Q. Is IvyKids good for kids?
A. Ivykids helps your kid gain a complete understanding of the English language including vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation and sentence formation. Our program ensures that your kid is practising daily on the app and thus guarantees improvement.

Q. Are Yellow class and Ivykids the same?
A. Yellow class has now transformed into Ivykids. We offer amazing features to make your kid fall in love with learning.

Q. What age group is IvyKids for?
A. Kids from ages 4 to 12 years can enrol in Ivykids.

title:
speakX: Learn to Speak English
5.0.0

creator: Personal AI Teacher
descriptionHtml:
🤔 Do you want to know how to learn English Speaking easily? 

SpeakX, your personalised AI English teacher, helps you unlock confident English communication and global opportunities. Explore 10,000+ activities to master pronunciation, grammar, and vocabulary like never before.
SpeakX improves your Vocabulary, English Speaking skills, and Communication skills with Daily 15 minutes speaking Practice on the SpeakX App.  
============================

Key Features:

📚 English Vocabulary Builder – Learn 5,000+ new words daily with meanings.
🗣️ Read and Speak – Learn to speak and read new words in sentences.
🎮 Grammar Games – Understand grammar rules with fun games.
💬 Real-life Conversation – Practice new words or sentences used in real-life conversations.
🤖 24x7 AI Teacher Call – Speak, practice and improve your learned English words and sentences with AI teacher.
============================ 

What Makes SpeakX so Special?  

✅ Available 24x7 – Your learning never stops.
✅ No Judgment, Only Learning – Practice freely with AI no fear of making mistakes. 
✅ Adaptive Learning – Curriculum designed and personalised as per your English level. 
✅ Learn at Your Own Pace – No strict schedules, practice anytime, anywhere. ✅ Real-Life Conversations – Master job interviews, office talks, travel conversations, conversations with friends, and more. 
✅ Instant Feedback – Get real-time corrections on pronunciation and grammar. 
✅ Simple & Affordable – Not expensive, just effective English learning at your fingertips.
============================

Why is SpeakX best for You? 

💡 For Ambitious Learners – No complicated lessons, just simple and practical English learning. 
💼 Grow in Your Career – Learn the English you need to get better jobs and promotions. 
🗣️ Speak with Confidence – No more hesitation or fear while talking in English. 📚 For Students & Professionals – Whether you're preparing for interviews or improving workplace communication, SpeakX helps you succeed.
============================  

📲 Improve English talking and English speaking skills with SpeakX App. Start Your Trial for ₹1/Day! 

Join 1CR+ learners practicing spoken English with SpeakX! Download now & start your journey to fluency. 🚀

Follow us on Social Media for more fun learning English tips:
